Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.7.3; Windows 10 64-bit; steam version

Problem: 

Whenever I try to start KSP I only get a white screen and after a few minutes the message that the game is not responding. I've tried waiting for up to 30 min. but still nothing. I've updated all drivers, reinstalled KSP and steam, checked my anti virus, deleted all virtual network adapters, tried to launch older versions (oldest I've tried was 1.0.5) but nothing worked so far. I've had the game running on the same machine before but that was years ago and I don't remember the version.

LOG: https://we.tl/t-3cLMyYl1xz
Update: Managed to launch KSP in safe mode so at least I know now that some other software is causing the issue.

1 hour ago, jm98 said:

some other software is causing the issue.

MSI Afterburner or Riva Tuner and similar programs have been the culprit for the last few weeks.

1 hour ago, Harry Rhodan said:

MSI Afterburner or Riva Tuner and similar programs have been the culprit for the last few weeks.

I know, I'm not using MSI Afterburner or any other software (that I know off) that uses the Rivatuner Statistics Server.

Update 2: Left the game running for a few hours and it seems like it's just incredibly slow.

HDD problem?

6 hours ago, Concodroid said:

HDD problem?

I don't think my HDD is the problem. The writing and reading speeds are like always and the drive isn't fragmented either.
Solution: Got KSP to start by setting the startup parameters to force OpenGL and the core profile (-force-glcore). Now it starts just fine and seems playable.

1 hour ago, jm98 said:

Solution: Got KSP to start by setting the startup parameters to force OpenGL and the core profile (-force-glcore). Now it starts just fine and seems playable.

That's interesting... why wasn't it running in Opengl from the start?

11 minutes ago, Concodroid said:

That's interesting... why wasn't it running in Opengl from the start? 

 

 

It also works when forcing it to use DirectX11 and the regular OpenGL. Seems like it doesn't matter as long as something gets forced.
